channel.title: Twitter / neiltyson
channel.description: Twitter updates from Neil deGrasse Tyson / neiltyson.

item.title: neiltyson: JUST POSTED: StarTalk, Cosmic Queries Edition "Asteroids Comets & Meteors" w/@ChuckNiceComic. iTunes & http://t.co/AnC8o6Q2lU

item.title: neiltyson: If butterflies were in charge, I wonder if they'd capture humans, put us on display, and admire our beauty & our differences?
item.description: neiltyson: If butterflies were in charge, I wonder if they'd capture humans, put us on display, and admire our beauty & our differences?

item.title: neiltyson: .@ChrisBerghoff: How do you define the difference between education & school? // I care more for ideas than for definitions.
item.description: neiltyson: .@ChrisBerghoff: How do you define the difference between education & school? // I care more for ideas than for definitions.

item.title: neiltyson: Try as I might, I cannot resist this geek-laden, lisp-inducing, annual utterance: "May the fourth be with you."
item.description: neiltyson: Try as I might, I cannot resist this geek-laden, lisp-inducing, annual utterance: "May the fourth be with you."

item.title: neiltyson: Oh, and, want to learn a Random Space Fact? Try @RandomSpaceFact. They're random. They're about space. And they're facts.
item.description: neiltyson: Oh, and, want to learn a Random Space Fact? Try @RandomSpaceFact. They're random. They're about space. And they're facts.

item.title: neiltyson: I love the universe, and all, but these folks just won't shut up about it: @KimberlyKowal @WhitNutt @StarStryder @elakdawalla
item.description: neiltyson: I love the universe, and all, but these folks just won't shut up about it: @KimberlyKowal @WhitNutt @StarStryder @elakdawalla

item.title: neiltyson: Space fans, like @TeamPreach, know that where there is no up or down, car license plates can do this: http://t.co/tjcrNbO7HJ
item.description: neiltyson: Space fans, like @TeamPreach, know that where there is no up or down, car license plates can do this: http://t.co/tjcrNbO7HJ

item.title: neiltyson: just to clarify: Batman is not the brains behind his powers. Yet IronMan is the brains behind his. IronMan wins the cagematch
item.description: neiltyson: just to clarify: Batman is not the brains behind his powers. Yet IronMan is the brains behind his. IronMan wins the cagematch

item.title: neiltyson: Iron Man - A superhero whose super powers derive entirely from his own intellect -- a mastery of physics & engineering.
item.description: neiltyson: Iron Man - A superhero whose super powers derive entirely from his own intellect -- a mastery of physics & engineering.

item.title: neiltyson: Not that anybody asked, but I object to religion in science classrooms not because it's religion but because it's not science
item.description: neiltyson: Not that anybody asked, but I object to religion in science classrooms not because it's religion but because it's not science

item.title: neiltyson: Hmm. My daughter's 950-page AP text "American History: A Survey" (McGrawHill, 2003) devotes 1.5 pages to the US Space Program
item.description: neiltyson: Hmm. My daughter's 950-page AP text "American History: A Survey" (McGrawHill, 2003) devotes 1.5 pages to the US Space Program

item.title: neiltyson: .@JakeGunst: There's piles of not dead bodies everywhere. // Yup. Journalists hardly ever write about not dead bodies.
item.description: neiltyson: .@JakeGunst: There's piles of not dead bodies everywhere. // Yup. Journalists hardly ever write about not dead bodies.

item.title: neiltyson: I wonder how many people are not dead by using GPS instead of fumbling with a folded map on the steering wheel while driving.
item.description: neiltyson: I wonder how many people are not dead by using GPS instead of fumbling with a folded map on the steering wheel while driving.

item.title: neiltyson: Watching on the FX network the film "2012" in which 6-billion people die. Was prepared: the rating warned of "mild violence"
item.description: neiltyson: Watching on the FX network the film "2012" in which 6-billion people die. Was prepared: the rating warned of "mild violence"

item.title: neiltyson: There's no crime in being ignorant. Problems arise when people who don't know they're ignorant rise to power.
item.description: neiltyson: There's no crime in being ignorant. Problems arise when people who don't know they're ignorant rise to power.

item.title: neiltyson: Even More #HouseholdMysteries: Pens that disappear even if you don't budge. One brightness burns out within a three-way bulb.
item.description: neiltyson: Even More #HouseholdMysteries: Pens that disappear even if you don't budge. One brightness burns out within a three-way bulb.

item.title: neiltyson: @LunchHam The Sun is 1/2 of 1% as bright at Jupiter than at Mercury. But Jupiter is 300x bigger. All told, it receives 1.5x the Sun's energy
item.description: neiltyson: @LunchHam The Sun is 1/2 of 1% as bright at Jupiter than at Mercury. But Jupiter is 300x bigger. All told, it receives 1.5x the Sun's energy

item.title: neiltyson: Other Household Mysteries: The Refrigerator light. Jellied toast falling face-down. The taste of OrangeJuice after toothpaste
item.description: neiltyson: Other Household Mysteries: The Refrigerator light. Jellied toast falling face-down. The taste of OrangeJuice after toothpaste

item.title: neiltyson: .@solaana: Why does gravity cease to function when removing ketchup from a bottle? // The universe brims with mysteries.
item.description: neiltyson: .@solaana: Why does gravity cease to function when removing ketchup from a bottle? // The universe brims with mysteries.
